RapidFit:
//================================================ // Formal Parameters to be fitted or fixed
F_s990 0.22667 0. 0.5 Free Unitless
delta_s990 1.3246 -6.3 6.3 Free Unitless
Csp990 #1.0 0.966 Fixed Unitless
F_s1008 0.066726 0. 0.25 Free Unitless
delta_s1008 0.77137 -6.3 6.3 Free Unitless
Csp1008 #1.0 0.956 Fixed Unitless
F_s1016 0.0081429 0. 0.25 Free Unitless
delta_s1016 0.49054 -6.3 6.3 Free Unitless
Csp1016 #1.0 0.926 Fixed Unitless
F_s1020 0.016019 0. 0.25 Free Unitless
delta_s1020 -0.51648 -6.3 6.3 Free Unitless
Csp1020 #1.0 0.926 Fixed Unitless
F_s1024 0.055242 0. 0.25 Free Unitless
delta_s1024 -0.45233 -6.3 6.3 Free Unitless
Csp1024 #1.0 0.956 Fixed Unitless
F_s1032 0.16777 0. 0.25 Free Unitless
delta_s1032 -0.65285 -6.3 6.3 Free Unitless
Csp1032 #1.0 0.966 Fixed Unitless
// True Physics Parameters for signal
gamma 0.67139 #0.663 0.0 2.0 Free ps^{-1}
deltaGamma 0.100 -0.1 0.3 Free ps^{-1}
Aperp_sq 0.24868 0. 0.5 Free Unitless
Azero_sq 0.52114 Free 0. 0.8 Unitless
delta_para 3.3057 6.3 -6.3 Free Unitless
delta_perp 3.0775 -6.3 6.3 Free Unitless
delta_zero 0.0 -3.3 3.3 Fixed Unitless
deltaM 17.67 Free ps-1
Phi_s 0.067 Free Unitless
lambda 0.944 # 0.944 Free Unitless
//.................................. // Detector Parameters
//Signal PDF time resolution parameters for double gaussian model.
timeResolutionScale 1.45 Free unitless
timeOffset //Leave at Zero, this is not used anywhere yet. 0.000 Fixed ps
// Mistag parameters
// Mistag calibration
mistagP1_OS 1.0004 Free
mistagP0_OS 0.3919 Free
mistagSetPoint_OS 0.392 Fixed
mistagDeltaP1_OS 0.0 Fixed
mistagDeltaP0_OS 0.011052 Free
mistagDeltaSetPoint_OS 0.0 Fixed
// Mistag calibration
mistagP1_SS 1.0303 Free
mistagP0_SS 0.35542 Free
mistagSetPoint_SS 0.350 Fixed
mistagDeltaP1_SS 0.0 Fixed
mistagDeltaP0_SS -0.018936 Free
mistagDeltaSetPoint_SS 0.0 Fixed
// Mistag calibration
mistagP1_OSSS 1.000 Fixed
mistagP0_OSSS 0.0048104 Free
mistagSetPoint_OSSS 0.0 Fixed
mistagDeltaP1_OSSS 0.0 Fixed
mistagDeltaP0_OSSS -0.011077 Free
mistagDeltaSetPoint_OSSS 0.0 Fixed
//========================================== // Specify which minimiser to use.
Minuit 100000 0.0001 0 #MinosErrors #NoHesse
alpha sWeight NegativeLogLikelihoodThreaded 16 #True #1000000 False #True #Petes
1
//========================================== // Specify the fit
//................................... // This applies a constraint on deltaM
deltaM 17.63 0.11
timeResolutionScale 1.45 0.06
// This applies a constraint on mistag scale
mistagP1_OS 1.000 0.023
mistagP0_OS 0.392 0.008
mistagDeltaP0_OS 0.011 # 0.011 0.0034
mistagP1_SS 1.000 0.16
mistagP0_SS 0.350 0.017
mistagDeltaP0_SS -0.019 # -0.019 0.005
mistagP0_OSSS 0.000 0.025
mistagDeltaP0_OSSS -0.011 # -0.011 0.004
// .................... // Attempt to constrain LLscan on the amplitudes
ATOTAL 1.0 0.00001
// .................... // Attempt to constrain GH and GL positive
GLandGH 0.0 0.00001
//=============================================================================================== //=============================================================================================== //=============================================================================================== //=============================================================================================== // The commonpdf and phase space to all segments
Bs2JpsiPhi_Signal_v6 UseHelicityBasis:True AngularAcceptanceFile:2011-1fbPaper/2011-AngularAcceptance-1fbPaper-UandB-30-20120706.root #AngularAcceptanceIgnoreNumerator:True UseTimeAcceptance:True UseEventResolution:True #OffsetToGammaForBetaFactor:0.00826 PlotComponents:True
time 0.3 14.0 ps
# # cosTheta # trcostheta # -1.0 # 1.0 # # # # phi # trphi # -3.14159 # 3.14159 # rad # # # cosPsi # trcospsi # -1.0 # 1.0 # #
helcosthetaK -1.0 1.0
helphi (helphi+TMath::Pi()-(helphi>0.)*(2.*TMath::Pi())) -3.1416 3.1416 rad
helcosthetaL -1.0 1.0
tag tagdecision 1. -1.
mistag tagomega 0. 0.5
eventResolution sigmat 0.0 0.12
sWeight -10 10
